Name: Thessaloniki
Description: The largest and most populous region in Central Macedonia, known for its vibrant cultural and historical significance.

Name: Halkidiki
Description: A region known for its three peninsulas, beautiful beaches, and Mount Athos.

Name: Kilkis
Description: A region known for its agricultural economy and proximity to the border with North Macedonia.

Name: Pella
Description: A region rich in history, home to the ancient city of Pella, the birthplace of Alexander the Great.

Name: Serres
Description: A historical region known for its natural beauty and fertile plains.

Name: Drama
Description: A region in northeastern Central Macedonia, known for its mountainous terrain and rich history.
